turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: A dull, constant ache behind the eyes and in the forehead that occurs in the afternoons could be related to several factors. Some possibilities include tension headaches, eye strain (especially if you work at a computer), dehydration, or even caffeine withdrawal if there have been any changes in your coffee consumption. Try drinking more water in the afternoons and taking breaks from screens if you work on a computer. See if this provides some relief.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: While it's understandable to be concerned about serious causes, headaches are very common and rarely indicate a serious underlying condition, especially with your described symptoms.
